title: Create fragment-input.tsx with mode prop for sentences and fragments
description:
Create app/fo-09/components/fragment-input.tsx based on FO-08's version with a new mode prop.

Copy from app/fo-08/components/fragment-input.tsx and make these changes:

1. **Add mode prop:** Add \ to FragmentInputProps (default: 'fragments')
2. **Remove reflectiveStatement prop:** Remove the optional reflectiveStatement prop and its rendering block
3. **Modify handleFragmentClick:**
   - When mode='fragments': existing behavior (remove trailing '...' via regex, append cleaned text + space)
   - When mode='sentences': append full text as-is + space (no '...' removal needed)
4. **Keep everything else:** textarea, More button, Continue button, Framer Motion animations

The mode prop controls ONLY how clicked items are processed. The visual layout stays the same.

Files to create:
- app/fo-09/components/fragment-input.tsx

Reference:
- app/fo-08/components/fragment-input.tsx (base, 199 lines)
- Spec: Implementation Notes #3

⚠️ Do not close until acceptance criteria pass.
acceptance_criteria: File app/fo-09/components/fragment-input.tsx exists AND contains mode prop in interface AND does NOT contain reflectiveStatement AND npm run build succeeds
